desc: Customized Shopify theme to meet client specifications.
Resolved link routing issue for product pages.
Optimized overall website and product page SEO for improved search engine visibility.

company: School of Occupational and Public Health
desc: Collaborated with project lead and research assistant to develop and maintain a React web application to collect brainwave data from a Neurosity Crown device via REST API.
Manipulated and organized collected JSON data for ease of readability, and implemented a feature to convert it to a downloadable CSV file.
Implemented a back-end using Node.js, enabling data to be saved to a remote MongoDB database.
Developed custom dashboards to match various business requirement specifications using Thinger.io.
Configured REST API endpoints to link IoT devices to Thinger.io data buckets to store telemetrics, such as asset location, event history, temperature and humidity, to be displayed by widgets.
Created and applied custom HTML and Javascript widgets to monitor and display data from IoT devices.
Collaborated with graphic and UX designers to create and design a landing page mockup for a concept wellness app.
Translated the design into a live and mobile responsive web page using ReactJs and SCSS.
